flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
体毛竖起来的话，是要喷出电的信号。
因为旁边也可能会有雷落下，
所以要注意。

体毛が　逆立ったら　電気を
吐く　サイン。　側に　雷が
落ちることも　あるので　注意。

When its fur stands on end, that’s a sign it’s
about to give off a jolt of electricity. Take care,
as sometimes lightning strikes next to it, too.

Quando rizza il pelo, è segno che sta per
lanciare una scarica elettrica. A volte attira
i fulmini, quindi è meglio stare attenti.

Cuando su pelaje se pone de punta, es señal de
que va a soltar una descarga. Hay que tener
cuidado porque pueden caer rayos cerca.

Steht ihm das Fell zu Berge, ist das ein Zeichen,
dass es gleich aus seinem Mund einen Blitz
abfeuert. In seiner Nähe schlagen oft Blitze ein.

Quand son pelage se hérisse, c’est signe qu’il
va projeter de l’électricité. Attention, car il
arrive que la foudre tombe près de lui.

體毛豎立就是要噴出電流的信號。
旁邊可能會有落雷，
所以要多加注意。

털이 곤두서면 전기를
뿜는다는 신호다. 근처에 번개가
떨어질 때도 있으므로 주의.

たいもうが　さかだったら　でんきを
はく　サイン。　そばに　かみなりが
おちることも　あるので　ちゅうい。

細胞の　出す　弱い　電気を　体毛の
静電気で　増幅させ　カミナリを　落とす。
逆立った　体毛は　電気を　帯びた　針。

Jolteon’s cells generate a low level of electricity. This power
is amplified by the static electricity of its fur, enabling the
Pokémon to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made of
electrically charged needles.

Le cellule di Jolteon generano un basso potenziale elettrico,
che viene tuttavia amplificato dall’elettricità statica della sua
pelliccia, da cui scatena fulmini. La pelliccia arruffata è fatta
di aghi caricati elettricamente.

Las células de Jolteon generan un nivel bajo de electricidad,
cuya intensidad aumenta con la electricidad estática que
acumula en un pelaje formado por agujas cargadas de
electricidad. Esta característica le permite lanzar rayos.

Blitzas Zellen erzeugen schwache Elektrizität. Diese wird aber
durch die statische Aufladung seines Fells verstärkt, sodass es
Blitzschläge erzeugen kann. Sein Fell besteht aus elektrisch
geladenen Nadeln.

Les cellules de Voltali génèrent un courant de faible intensité.
Ce pouvoir est amplifié par l’électricité statique de ses poils,
ce qui lui permet d’envoyer des éclairs. Sa fourrure hérissée
est faite d’aiguilles chargées d’électricité.

세포에서 나오는 약한 전기를 털의
정전기로 증폭시켜 번개를 떨어트린다.
곤두세운 털은 전기를 띤 바늘이다.

さいぼうの　だす　よわい　でんきを　たいもうの
せいでんきで　ぞうふくさせ　カミナリを　おとす。
さかだった　たいもうは　でんきを　おびた　はり。

細胞の　出す　弱い　電気を　体毛の
静電気で　増幅させ　カミナリを　落とす。
逆立った　体毛は　電気を　帯びた　針。

Jolteon’s cells generate a low level of electricity. This power is
amplified by the static electricity of its fur, enabling the
Pokémon to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made of
electrically charged needles.

Le cellule di Jolteon generano un basso potenziale elettrico,
che viene tuttavia amplificato dall’elettricità statica della sua
pelliccia, da cui scatena fulmini. La pelliccia arruffata è fatta
di aghi caricati elettricamente.

Las células de Jolteon generan un nivel bajo de electricidad,
cuya intensidad aumenta con la electricidad estática que
acumula en un pelaje formado por agujas cargadas de
electricidad. Esta característica le permite lanzar rayos.

Blitzas Zellen erzeugen schwache Elektrizität. Diese wird aber
durch die statische Aufladung seines Fells verstärkt, sodass es
Blitzschläge erzeugen kann. Sein Fell besteht aus elektrisch
geladenen Nadeln.

Les cellules de Voltali génèrent un courant de faible intensité.
Ce pouvoir est amplifié par l’électricité statique de ses poils,
ce qui lui permet d’envoyer des éclairs. Sa fourrure hérissée
est faite d’aiguilles chargées d’électricité.

세포에서 나오는 약한 전기를 털의
정전기로 증폭시켜 번개를 떨어트린다.
곤두세운 털은 전기를 띤 바늘이다.

さいぼうの　だす　よわい　でんきを　たいもうの
せいでんきで　ぞうふくさせ　カミナリを　おとす。
さかだった　たいもうは　でんきを　おびた　はり。

空気中の　マイナスイオンを
吸いこんで　約１００００ボルトの
電気を　吐き出すことがある。

It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to
blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

Accumula ioni negativi nell’atmosfera per lanciare
saette da 10.000 volt.

Acumula iones negativos de la atmósfera para lanzar
rayos de 10 000 voltios de potencia.

Dieses Pokémon entzieht der Atmosphäre Ionen,
die es in Blitze von 10 000 V Stärke umwandelt.

Il se charge d’électricité statique pour envoyer
des décharges de 10 000 V.

공기 중의 마이너스 이온을
빨아들여 약 10000볼트의
전기를 내뱉을 수 있다.

くうきちゅうの　マイナスイオンを
すいこんで　やく１００００ボルトの
でんきを　はきだすことができる。

体内に　電気が　たまると
全身の　体毛が　全部
鋭く　とがりはじめる。

Every hair on its body starts to stand sharply on
end if it becomes charged with electricity.

Quando inizia a caricarsi di elettricità, gli si rizza
ogni pelo del corpo.

Todos los pelos de su cuerpo se ponen de punta si
empieza a cargarse de electricidad.

Lädt es sich mit Elektrizität auf, steht jedes
einzelne seiner Körperhaare steil nach oben.

Chaque poil sur son corps se dresse quand il se
charge en électricité.

체내에 전기가 모이면
전신의 털이 모두
날카롭게 곤두서기 시작한다.

たいないに　でんきが　たまると
ぜんしんの　たいもうが　ぜんぶ
するどく　とがりはじめる。

By storing electricity in its body,
it can shoot its bristlelike fur
like a barrage of missiles.

By storing electricity in its body,
it can shoot its bristlelike fur
like a barrage of missiles.

If agitated, it uses electricity to
straighten out its fur and launch
it in small bunches.

Face au danger, il fait appel à
l’électricité pour dresser ses
poils et lancer des décharges.

If agitated, it uses electricity to
straighten out its fur and launch
it in small bunches.

Face au danger, il fait appel à
l’électricité pour dresser ses
poils et lancer des décharges.

Every hair on its body starts to
stand sharply on end if it becomes
charged with electricity.

It concentrates the weak electric
charges emitted by its cells and
launches wicked lightning bolts.

If agitated, it uses electricity to
straighten out its fur and launch
it in small bunches.

It controls 10,000-volt power
and can raise all the fur on its
body as if it were sharp needles.

It controls 10,000-volt power
and can raise all the fur on its
body as if it were sharp needles.

It accumulates negative ions in the
atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt
lightning bolts.

If it is angered or startled, the fur all
over its body bristles like sharp needles
that pierce foes.

Its cells generate weak power that is
amplified by its fur’s static electricity
to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is
made of electrically charged needles.

JOLTEON’s cells generate a low level of
electricity. This power is amplified by
the static electricity of its fur, enabling the POKéMON to drop
thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made
of electrically charged needles.

JOLTEON’s cells generate a low level of
electricity. This power is amplified by
the static electricity of its fur, enabling the POKéMON to drop
thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made
of electrically charged needles.

The negatively
charged ions
generated in its fur create a
constant sparking
noise.

Every hair on its
body starts to
stand sharply on end if it becomes
charged with
electricity.

It concentrates
the weak electric
charges emitted by its cells and
launches wicked
lightning bolts.

A sensitive POKé­
MON that easily
becomes sad or angry. Every time
its mood changes,
it charges power.

It accumulates
negative ions in
the atmosphere to blast out 10000-
volt lightning
bolts.

It accumulates
negative ions in
the atmosphere to blast out 10000-
volt lightning
bolts.
